comment: Rude and condescending. Definitely not someone to look up to professionally.

She will never tell you what to do in order to fix something but she will help guide you towards the answer; it will always be up to you to figure things out. You may start to dread going to class but the work you produce will be your best. Always come to class with something to show and have a reason for why/what you designed.

Professor Sperry is a wonderful professor in that she pushes you to do your best. She can be disorganized and unclear. Just ask her again. She can be tough - stick with it. Don't miss class, be on time, don't call her by her first name. If you stick with the program and work hard, she'll respect you, love you, and open up to you. A great professor.

She is the toughest teacher I have ever had. She is a working designer and gives real world advice. If you want to be a good designer, she is the best professor in the department. Never be late, never call her by her first name, always go by her office and ask for her advice...and she will like you. She was taught by Milton Glaser himself!
